summary: Convert input data to a file location that can be used as an input to a run_cwl_url process
description:
This process takes input data, often a raster data cube but any data type can be supported, 

saves it to a remote server location as a file and returns the location of this file for future recall.

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: The data to be passed to the preparation process.

schema.description: A raster data cube, an image collection stored at the back-end. Different back-ends have different internal representations for this data structure.
schema.title: Raster data cube
Single Value
schema.description: A single value of any data type.

parameters.name: save_location
parameters.description: Parameter to define whether the prepared file should be saved locally on the server or uploaded to a remote server location.

parameters.name: git_token
parameters.description: Git-generated token to be used with Git API to gain access to specified repository and allow file upload.

parameters.name: git_repository
parameters.description: Location of Git repository to upload data to in the format '<user-name>/<repo-name>'. A new directory will be created in this repository called 'data'.

InvalidSaveType.message: The specified save location is not supported.

InsufficientArguments.message: To save in requested location need to provide additional arguments, e.g. Token and location of Git repository

returns.description: The location of the generated file, either as a url or local file path.

schema.title: Location of file
schema.description: Location of the output file, given as a string.
